content:
Thanks very much to the organisers of LT2026! I got very little done this week because I was constantly distracted by many interesting talks. As an organiser of LT2025 I know how much hard work it is, and even though it's over for the participants, the authors still have to top and tail and upload all the videos (and I'm sure I'm not the only person who had to miss at least one talk because of teaching commitments so will be eagerly waiting for this!).

Thanks again to @RÃ©my Degenne , @Markus Himmel , @Jireh Loreaux and @Patrick Massot !
